title: Silver Border S5
body: So, In Season 5 I got Silver 5 and didn't receive my Silver Border so I was wondering what happened. I was wondering because my friend SilentGamer123 got his Silver Border this season for getting Silver 5.

replies.body: Doesn't really matter anymore. Borders only last for one season. Even if you got your border for silver 5 last year, it wouldn't carry over because you only achieved bronze 4. It's kinda late to post this, since this occurred a year ago.

I believe you mean Season 6, which is the ranked season that just recently ended. We can assist you with your ranked rewards if you reach out in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any questions.
